title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2020
content:
3rdJanuary,2020 Statutory Instruments 53
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.3OF2020
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(ActNo.35of2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2020
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsection125oftheElectoral
ProcessAct,2016,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
Order,2020.
2. A candidate for election as a councillor in a district and Dateand
ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the timeof
nomination
ReturningOfficeronThursday,16thJanuary,2020,between0900
forelection
hoursand1500hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 16th Campaign
January,2020,at1500hoursandcloseat 1800hoursonWednesday, period
12thFebruary,2020.
4. (1) Thepollfortheelectionofacouncillorinadistrictand Electiondate
ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Thursday, 13th andtime
February,2020,between0600hoursand1800hours.
(2) Apollshallnotbetakeninadistrictorwardifonly
onecandidateisvalidlynominated.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101Lusaka.PriceK4.00each.
54 Statutory Instruments 3rdJanuary,2020
SCHEDULE
(Paragraphs2and4)
ELECTIONSFORCOUNCILLORS
District Constituency Ward No. Name
Kalomo KalomoCentral 109004018 Nachikungu
Mitete Mitete 110006001 Kakwacha
Mongu MonghuCentral 110007010 Kaande
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this
31stdayofDecember,2019.
JUSTICE E.E.CHULU,
Chairperson
A. C. NHEKAIRO,
Vice-Chairperson
E.J. SIKAZWE,
Member
A. D. SIMWINGA,
Member
LUSAKA
31stDecember,2019
[EC.101/5/2CONF.]
